name: Shooting Game Duck Hunter 3D: Animal (Birds) Hunting - Best Time Killer Game of 2016
name_original: Shooting Game Duck Hunter 3D: Animal (Birds) Hunting - Best Time Killer Game of 2016
description:
Hunting season is open! Play the most beautiful, astonishing and awesome 3D duck hunting game in the world!
Bored with zombie shooter, or sniper games? Hunter Game: Duck Hunting Free will amaze you with stunning 3D locations and realistic weapons. Our game brings fun and relax to the whole new level and it’s completely free! Easy ‘tap to shoot’ controls will let you focus on what’s most important in games: joy from free playing.

The hunting season is ON! Shoot those birds!

Feeling bored with tap to shoot clones where you play as a sniper in ww2, shoot tanks or shoot zombies? Hate all those “only for girls” farm candy games? If so, try Hunting Game: Duck Hunter Free. Hunting in a different approach.

Features

Hunting Game: Duck Hunter Free brings you beautiful sceneries of fields, forests and hunting grounds in full 3D for free.

Hunt ducks and realistic birds with stunning 3D weapons

Beat the best score and get awesome shooting experience in Duck Hunter 3D game!

Add arcade fun to cool power ups and bonuses and play the hottest and more impressive shooting game this season!

What’s more - the game is completely free to play - no hidden microtransactions!

How to play?

* Tap to shoot ducks
* Don't get killed by angry birds, hunt them!
* Shoot glowing birds for bonuses and power ups
* Get the best score
